text:
Edward Allan Clarke (5 October 1950 – 10 January 2018), better known as "Fast" Eddie Clarke, was a British guitarist. He was a member of heavy metal bands Fastway and Motörhead. Of Motörhead's classic lineup, which was made up of Lemmy, himself and Phil "Philthy Animal" Taylor, he was the last surviving member. He was born in London.
Clarke died of pneumonia on 10 January 2018 in London at the age of 67.
